title: 7th Annual Latke Festival
desc: The 7th Annual Latke Festival is sure to add some sizzle to your Monday! Enjoy Latke creations from talented chefs and restaurants across the city and select the People's Choice Best Latke.  Proceeds from the event will directly benefit  The Sylvia Center , a nonprofit organization dedicated to inspiring children and their families to eat well through hands-on experiences on the farm and in the kitchen. Latkes from last year included an:  Okinawa Latke: Japanese Sweet Potato & Crispy Chestnut Latke in Duck Fat with Miso Cr?me Fraiche & Yuzu;  Daikon & Scallion Latke, Black Vinegar Sauce, Chili Creme Fraiche & Pickled Pear ; Sweet Potato Latke with Duck Rillette & Black Truffle Vinaigrette;  Katchkie Farm Green Tomato and Potato Latke with Horseradish Apple Butter; S weet Potato & Celeriac Schmaltz-Fried Latkes with Housemade Chopped Liver, Cranberry, & Horseradish and Apple Relish; and? Latke with Whipped Creme Fraiche, Pickled Katchkie Farm Ginger & Cardamom Apple Bake. ? Get ready for this year's lineup of tasty latke treats from restaurants including: ?
